description: Detects a file or folder's permissions being modified.
false_positives: Users interacting with the files on their own (unlikely unless privileged users).
name: File or Folder Permissions Modifications
query: ((process.executable:(*\\takeown.exe OR *\\cacls.exe OR *\\icacls.exe) AND process.command_line:*\/grant*) OR ((process.executable:*\\attrib.exe AND process.command_line:*\-r*) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:*ICACLS\ C\:\\ProgramData\\dynatrace\\gateway\\config\\connectivity.history\ \/reset) OR (process.command_line:*ICACLS\ C\:\\ProgramData\\dynatrace\\gateway\\config\\config.properties\ \/grant\ \:r\ * AND process.command_line:*S\-1\-5\-19\:F*)))))
author: Jakob Weinzettl
oscd.community
